title: people to play with!
body:
taking a break from solo que but would like a few chill people to play ranked 5s or just normals. 
im plat 5 and i play lots of {{champion:9}} 
any ranks welcome. add me in game
 IGN: Fid

replies.body: Ay man, I'm looking to start a ranked team once iv got enough players, I'm currently in Bronze 3 and want to climb but with a team that isn't salty or toxic. If ya don't mind playing with a less experienced player but a quick learner, then hit us up if you're keen to join. IGN: CastielZaim11
